alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Fajardo; Luquillo; Rio Grande (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 02 at 6:44PM ADT until July 02 at 9:45PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Ceiba Municipality in Puerto Rico... Fajardo Municipality in Puerto Rico... Luquillo Municipality in Puerto Rico... Rio Grande Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 845 PM AST. * At 544 PM AST, Emergency Management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area, and Rio Fajardo is nearly out of its banks. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
